entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
